text:
Panagiotis "Taki" Theodoracopulos (;,; born 11 August 1936) is a Greek journalist and writer. Theodoracopulos's column "High Life" has appeared in "The Spectator" since 1977, where he wrote a series of controversial articles. Some of his articles have been edited by Boris Johnson.
In 2002, Theodoracopulos founded "The American Conservative" magazine with Pat Buchanan and Scott McConnell. He was also the publisher of the British magazine "Right Now!".
He lives in New York City, London and Gstaad, Switzerland.
